item.title: Curate This : The Hands-On, How-To Guide To Content Curation – Steven Rosenbaum (Abridged)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
The concept of “Curation” has rapidly moved from museums to mainstream media. As the sheer volume of Tweets, Likes, Blogs, YouTube videos, and emails overwhelm the web, publishers and brands are increasingly being asked to provide a human face to content organization and editorial curation. With the right framework, curation can be a powerful tool […]

The post Curate This : The Hands-On, How-To Guide To Content Curation – Steven Rosenbaum (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.
item.content:encoded:
The concept of “Curation” has rapidly moved from museums to mainstream media. As the sheer volume of Tweets, Likes, Blogs, YouTube videos, and emails overwhelm the web, publishers and brands are increasingly being asked to provide a human face to content organization and editorial curation. With the right framework, curation can be a powerful tool to help editorial meet new challenges.

The post Curate This : The Hands-On, How-To Guide To Content Curation – Steven Rosenbaum (Abridged) appeared first on Hoardible.
